data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Ardèche, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ardèche, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 121,698 lost people in  Ardèche, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Ardèche, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 3,975 believers in the county of Ardèche to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, help the 3,975 believers find a person of peace today among the 319,525 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ardèche, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Ardèche, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

location.name: Ardèche
